## Data Source
Statistics from the 2018-19 NBA season.
  
Total Statistics for Individual NBA Players: '2018-19_nba_player_statistics.csv'  sourced from ^[basketball-reference.com][basketball-reference.com](https://www.basketball-reference.com/leagues/NBA_2019_totals.html)

Salary for Individual Players (2018-19 season) : '2018-19_nba_player-salaries.csv'sourced from ^[hoopshype.com/salaries][hoopshype.com/salaries](https://hoopshype.com/salaries/)

Team Payroll Budget for the 2019-20 NBA season: '2019-20_nba_team-payroll.csv' sourced from ^[hoopshype.com/salaries][hoopshype.com/salaries](https://hoopshype.com/salaries/)

Miscellaneous Team Statistics: '2018-19_nba_team-statistics_1.csv' sourced from ^[basketball-reference.com][basketball-reference.com](https://www.basketball-reference.com/leagues/NBA_2019.html)

Total Team Statistics: '2018-19_nba_team-statistics_2.csv' sourced from ^[basketball-reference.com][basketball-reference.com](https://www.basketball-reference.com/leagues/NBA_2019.html)
